main event: Witnesses reported an elongated object emitting red and green lights maneuvering in the sky over Catskill, New York on April 6, 1966.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 15 minutes before it disappeared., The sighting involved a couple named Mr. & Mrs. Patterson., The object was reported to have emitted both red and green lights., A letter from Major HECTOR QUINTANILLA, Jr. requested more information about an observation from April 11, 1966., There were multiple reports of unidentified lights in the sky in the Catskill area around this time.
sighted object: an elongated object emitting red and green lights
witness description: Mr. & Mrs. Patterson, as well as a child who reported a sighting.
